availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Susan Miller. Father of Ellis H. Miller and Mildred Jane Miller. Married to Nancy M. Blaylock Miller in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in May 1854. Father of Margaret A. Miller, William J. Miller, Mary Elizabeth Miller, Pamela Miller, Emily C. Miller, W.N. Miller, F.D Miller, and S.M. Miller. Famer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 351A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollard's Tan-yard Division, p. 153-54.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Bucksnort, p. 415B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p 160.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births, 1856, p. 1 of 4 of microfilm.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births, 1857, p. 3 of 5 of microfilm.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Caldwell County, KY, June 1863, p. 14, p. 664 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
